author: cbs8
title: Automotive Piston System Market 2015 - Global Analysis and Forecasts to 2019
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 23, Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/j93p4w/global_automotive ) has announced the addition of the "Global Automotive Piston System Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The global automotive piston market to grow at a CAGR of 5.65% over the period 2014-2019.
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global automotive piston market for the period 2015-2019. The market size is calculated based on the revenue generated through the sales of automotive pistons globally. The report presents five key vendors and a detailed analysis of these vendors. Based on the type of material used for automotive piston manufacturing, the market is segmented into aluminum-based pistons and steel-based pistons. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
Sourcing products from low-cost countries has significantly increased during the past decade. Low-cost countries in APAC such as China and India have a strong positive impact on the automotive piston and the ancillary products markets, which has established cost competitiveness in the market for global players in this sector. With the rise in manufacturing costs, existing piston manufacturers in the US and Europe are shifting their operations to APAC, where labor, raw materials, and other facilities are available at a low cost. Strong engineering skills and the relatively low cost of the skilled workforce in emerging economies such as South Korea , China and India are attracting manufacturers to shift their operations in these countries.
According to the report, the automotive industry in markets such as India , China , South Korea , and Mexico is growing at a steady pace, which in turn is leading to increased demand for automotive pistons. Improvements in the economic conditions of emerging countries have increased the demand for and production of automobiles in these countries. The growing demand for commercial vehicles in these countries is also boosting the growth of the automotive piston market.
Further, the report states that the shifting focus on EVs would pose a significant degree of threat to the automotive piston market during the forecast period.
